name: Kathleen M. McCann
bio: Born and raised in Weymouth, Massachusetts, Irish American poet Kathleen M. McCann earned an MFA at Washington University. She is the author of the poetry collection A Roof Gone to Sky (2009), and her work has been included in former US Poet Laureate Ted Kooser’s syndicated column, “American Life in Poetry.” She teaches at Eastern Nazarene College and lives in Massachusetts.
